data.name: Amazon Fire
data.description: Fantastic price. Large content ecosystem. Good parental controls. Helpful technical support.

data.name: Lenovo IdeaPad Miix 700
data.description: Keyboard cover is included. Fanless Core m5 processor. Full-size USB ports. Adjustable kickstand.

data.name: Amazon Fire HD 8
data.description: Amazon's latest Fire HD 8 tablet is a great value for media consumption.
